name: ru.mxmit.parking

scripts.initialize: reco checkversion && react-scripts build && reco copy
scripts.start: reco checkversion && react-scripts build && reco copy && reco serve
scripts.build: reco checkversion && react-scripts build && reco copy && cordova build browser
scripts.start-android: reco checkversion && react-scripts build -- --profile && reco copy && cordova run android
scripts.build-android: reco checkversion && react-scripts build -- --profile && reco copy && cordova build android
scripts.start-ios: reco checkversion && react-scripts build -- --profile && reco copy && cordova run ios
scripts.build-ios: reco checkversion && react-scripts build -- --profile && reco copy && cordova build ios

description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.
author: DataCyber-OrChuban, react.cordova: Apache Cordova Team and React.js
